getComponentAction(Class<?>) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPAdapter
For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ActionComponenet to define the binding rules between a component and it's action in the associated presenter if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException
getComponentModel(Class<?>) - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.MVPAdapter
For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ModelComponent to define the binding rules between a component and it's property name in the associated model.

getEventType() - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.ActionBinding
The type of event to add to the current view component, if is null use the default event type.

getInitPropertyName() - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelBinding
The current property name.
getInitPropertyValue() - Method in interface org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelBinding
throw PropertyNotFoundException if the property is not found in the model throw PropertyNotInitializedException if the property is not initialized correctly Use this method to load data that the current component need to display in the view rendering, for example a comboBox.
